question: Which Indian airport received the Platinum Recognition in the Airports Council International (ACI) Asia-Pacific Green Airports Recognition 2020?
option3: Indira Gandhi International Airport, New Delhi
explanation:
Hyderabad International Airport received the highest Platinum Recognition in the Airports Council International (ACI) Asia-Pacific Green Airports Recognition 2020.
The airport owned and operated by the GMR group, has won the recognition in the 15-35 million passengers per annum (MPPA) category. ACI Asia Pacific announced the result to promote best environmental practices, efficient water management practices and to minimise the aviation sectorâ€™s impact on the environment.
